comment.author: 15631192@N04
comment._content: Interesting!   A typical Me.262 Schwalbe, apparently not even given one of those hideous faked-up postwar paint jobs so common to display aircraft.  This has to be almost IMMEDIATELY after the war!

comment.author: 68002240@N05
comment._content: Me262A-1a/R1 WNr.500491 FE-111/T2-111  - previous Watson Whizzer 888. Now with the National Air and Space Museum, Washington, DC
